name: Super Jimmy's Adventure!
description:
(This is NOT a spiritual successor to Jimmy's Adventure nor a game related to NSRMB! It's just a game made for the GBJAM 10!)

Jimmy is back in a GameBoy-like adventure!

Jimmy's friend "Billy" is inviting him over at his new Treehouse! But, the tree is a bit too high... Can Jimmy climb up the tree and get to Billy? Probably, yes, because the game is easy and short (lol).

The "SJAHD.zip" version isn't made for the game jam! It's an HD Full Screen version of the game!
